html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02792025-03-05FIN
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Real Property (GST/HST) Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the REAL PROPERTY GST/HST REGULATIONS in order to (1) to implement a rebate in respect of the provincial component of the HST for purpose-built rental housing situated in New Brunswick based on the criteria set by New Brunswick, which rebate would be available for purpose-built rental housing projects for construction begins on or after November 15, 2024, and before 2028, and in respect of which construction is substantially completed before 2030.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0076 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending the REAL PROPERTY GST/HST REGULATIONS in order to (1) to implement a rebate in respect of the provincial component of the HST for purpose-built rental housing situated in New Brunswick based on the criteria set by New Brunswick, which rebate would be available for purpose-built rental housing projects for construction begins on or after November 15, 2024, and before 2028, and in respect of which construction is substantially completed before 2030.
